## DATE\_TIME\_SELECTOR\_CONFIGURATION variable

Injection token used for obtaining datetime selector configuration

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
DATE_TIME_SELECTOR_CONFIGURATION: InjectionToken<DateTimeSelectorOptions<any>>
```
